BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISWOT_REC_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODE_OF_RECEIPT,STR_TYPE_OF_RECEIPT,STR_RECEIPT_NUMBER,DT_RECEIPT_DATE,STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE,STR_EVENT_CODE,NUM_HALL_ID,DT_BOOKING_FOR_DATE,NUM_BOOKING_DEPOSIT_AMT,NUM_SECURITY_DEPOSIT_AMT,STR_TYPE_OF_PAYMENT,STR_MODE_OF_PAYMENT,STR_CHEQUE_DD_NUMBER,STR_BANK_NAME,DT_AMOUNT_RECEIVED_DATE,NUM_AMOUNT_RECEIVED,STR_AMOUNT_RECEIVED_BY,STR_REMARKS,STR_STATUS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,NUM_CLEARANCE_DEPOSIT_AMT, NUM_OTHER_DEPOSIT_AMT, DT_VACAT_DATE) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISWOT_REC_TRN SET DT_RECEIPT_DATE=?,STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE=?,DT_BOOKING_FOR_DATE=?,NUM_BOOKING_DEPOSIT_AMT=?,NUM_SECURITY_DEPOSIT_AMT=?,STR_TYPE_OF_PAYMENT=?,STR_MODE_OF_PAYMENT=?,STR_CHEQUE_DD_NUMBER=?,STR_BANK_NAME=?,DT_AMOUNT_RECEIVED_DATE=?,NUM_AMOUNT_RECEIVED=?,STR_AMOUNT_RECEIVED_BY=?,STR_REMARKS=?,NUM_CLEARANCE_DEPOSIT_AMT=?, NUM_OTHER_DEPOSIT_AMT=? WHERE STR_RECEIPT_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISWOT_REC_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_RECEIPT_NUMBER=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
